summary.span: 使用绘图命令描述几何图形。

span.span: Describes a geometry using drawing commands.

summary.span: 此类与 类结合使用，以创建不支持数据绑定、动画或修改的轻量几何图形。

span.span: This class is used with the class to create a lightweight geometry that does not support data binding, animation, or modification.

MemberSignature.Usage: streamGeometryContext.ArcTo (point, size, rotationAngle, isLargeArc, sweepDirection, isStroked, isSmoothJoin)

param.name: point
param.span: 弧线末尾的目标点。

span.span: The destination point for the end of the arc.

param.name: size
param.span: 其圆周用于绘制角度的椭圆的半径（半宽度和高度的一半）。

span.span: The radii (half the width and half the height) of an oval whose perimeter is used to draw the angle.

param.span: 如果椭圆在所有方向上都是非常大的，则圆弧会舍入，如果它接近平面，则弧线会。例如，非常大的宽度和高度会表示一个非常大的椭圆，这会给角带来轻微曲率。

span.span: If the oval is very rounded in all directions, the arc will be rounded, if it is nearly flat, so will the arc. For example, a very large width and height would represent a very large oval, which would give a slight curvature for the angle.

param.name: rotationAngle
param.span: 指定曲线的椭圆的旋转角度。

span.span: The rotation angle of the oval that specifies the curve.

param.span: 可以使用此参数来旋转弧线的曲面。

span.span: The curvature of the arc can be rotated with this parameter.

param.name: isLargeArc
param.span: 若要绘制大于 180 度的弧线，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to draw the arc greater than 180 degrees; otherwise, .

param.name: sweepDirection
param.span: 一个值，该值指示在 还是 方向绘制弧线。

span.span: A value that indicates whether the arc is drawn in the or direction.

param.name: isStroked
param.span: 若要在使用 呈现线段时使线段描边，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to make the segment stroked when a is used to render the segment; otherwise, .

param.name: isSmoothJoin
param.span: 在用 描边时，如果要将此线段与前一条线段之间的联接视为角，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to treat the join between this segment and the previous segment as a corner when stroked with a ; otherwise, .

summary.span: 绘制一条到指定点的弧线。

span.span: Draws an arc to the specified point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使用上一段的终点作为起始点。This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point. 如果这是图形中的第一段，则它将使用由方法指定的点 作为起点。If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the method as its start point. 如果包含 或任何非描边或未填充段，则无法对其进行序列化。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法绘制圆弧 。The following example shows how to draw an arc using the method. span.span: to use the area contained by this figure for hit-testing, rendering, and clipping; otherwise, .

param.name: isClosed
param.span: 若要关闭图，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to close the figure; otherwise, .

param.span: 例如，如果绘制了两条连接线，并且 设置为 ，则绘制的就只是两条线，但如果 设置为 ，则这两条线将封闭进而形成一个三角形。

span.span: For example, if two connecting lines are drawn, and is set to , the drawing will just be of two lines but if is set to , the two lines will be closed to create a triangle.
Specifies the starting point for a new figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过多次调用此方法，您可以在此) (自包含几何形状 。By calling this method multiple times, you can create multiple figures (self-contained geometric shapes) within this . 如果包含 或任何非描边或未填充段，则无法对其进行序列化。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments.

summary.span: 绘制一条到指定点的贝塞尔曲线。

span.span: Draws a Bezier curve to the specified point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三次方贝塞尔曲线由起点、终点和两个控制点定义。A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, end point, and two control points. 第一个控制点确定段前半的曲率，第二个控制点决定线段的后半的曲率。The first control point determines the curvature of the first half of the segment, and the second control point determines the curvature of the second half of the segment. 此方法使用上一段的终点作为起始点。This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point. 如果这是图形中的第一段，则它将使用由方法指定的点 作为起点。If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the method as its start point. 如果包含 或任何非描边或未填充段，则无法对其进行序列化。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法绘制贝塞尔曲线 。The following example shows how to draw a Bezier curve using the method. [!code-csharp[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#StreamGeometryBezierToExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/StreamGeometryBezierToExample.cs#streamgeometrybeziertoexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#StreamGeometryBezierToExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/streamgeometrybeziertoexample.vb#streamgeometrybeziertoexamplewholepage)]

exception.span: 试图添加一条线段，但未通过调用 方法来指定图形的起点。

span.span: An attempt was made to add a segment without starting a figure by calling the method.

summary.span: 关闭此上下文并刷新其内容，以使其可以呈现。

span.span: Closes this context and flushes its content so that it can be rendered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭后，不能修改上下文。Once closed, the context cannot be modified. 上下文必须先关闭，然后才能呈现其内容。The context must be closed before its content can be rendered.

exception.span: 已关闭或释放此上下文。

span.span: This context has already been closed or disposed.

param.name: points
param.span: 为一条或多条贝塞尔曲线指定控制点和目标点的点列表。

span.span: The list of points that specify control points and destination points for one or more Bezier curves.

param.span: 此列表中的点数应为三的倍数。

span.span: The number of points in this list should be a multiple of three.

param.name: isStroked
param.span: 若要在使用 呈现线段时使线段描边，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to make the segment stroked when a is used to render the segment; otherwise, .

param.name: isSmoothJoin
param.span: 在用 描边时，如果要将此线段与前一条线段之间的联接视为角，则为 ；否则为 。

summary.span: 绘制一条或多条互相连接的贝塞尔曲线。

span.span: Draws one or more connected Bezier curves.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的第一个点 `points` 指定第一个控制点，接下来指定第二个控制点，第三个点指定终点，下一个点指定下一条曲线的第一个控制点，依此类推。The first point in `points` specifies the first control point, the next specifies the second control point, the third point specifies the end point, the next point specifies the first control point of the next curve, and so on. 此方法使用上一段的终点作为起始点。This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point. 如果这是图形中的第一段，则它将使用由方法指定的点 作为起点。If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the method as its start point. 如果包含 或任何非描边或未填充段，则无法对其进行序列化。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法绘制多个连接的贝塞尔曲线 。The following example shows how to draw multiple connected Bezier curves using the method. [!code-csharp[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#StreamGeometryPolyBezierToExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/StreamGeometryPolyBezierToExample.cs#streamgeometrypolybeziertoexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#StreamGeometryPolyBezierToExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/streamgeometrypolybeziertoexample.vb#streamgeometrypolybeziertoexamplewholepage)]

summary.span: 绘制一条二次贝塞尔曲线。

span.span: Draws a quadratic Bezier curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同于使用两个控制点的三次方贝塞尔曲线，二次三次方贝塞尔曲线使用单个控制点。Unlike a cubic Bezier curve, which uses two control points, a quadratic cubic Bezier curve uses a single control point. 此方法使用上一段的终点作为起始点。This method uses the end point of the previous segment as its starting point. 如果这是图形中的第一段，则它将使用由方法指定的点 作为起点。If this is the first segment in a figure, it uses the point specified by the method as its start point. 如果包含 或任何非描边或未填充段，则无法对其进行序列化。A cannot be serialized if it contains a or any non-stroked or unfilled segments. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法绘制二次贝塞尔曲线 。The following example shows how to draw a quadratic Bezier curve using the method. [!code-csharp[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#StreamGeometryQuadraticBezierToExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/CSharp/StreamGeometryQuadraticBezierToExample.cs#streamgeometryquadraticbeziertoexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip#StreamGeometryQuadraticBezierToExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeometriesMiscSnippets_procedural_snip/visualbasic/streamgeometryquadraticbeziertoexample.vb#streamgeometryquadraticbeziertoexamplewholepage)]

exception.span: 试图添加一条线段，但未通过调用 方法来指定图形的起点。

span.span: An attempt was made to add a segment without starting a figure by calling the method.

Sub Dispose () Implements IDisposable.Dispose

summary.span: 此成员支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构，但不能在代码中直接使用。

span.span: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
